short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A kind of Linguistic Therapy that functions as an Engineered Subconscious.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Spirit Check, by Spiritual Bro, is a spell check for your spirit. The extension identifies negative language, prompts moments of presence, and offers opportunities to elevate. The extension does not record or transmit data, and all language changes are co-created, and co-owned, by One Inc Cooperative.
